import {React, useState, useEffect} from 'react' import './style/message.css' import useAxios from '../utils/useAxios' import jwtDecode from 'jwt-decode' import moment from 'moment' import axios from 'axios' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom/' function MessageDetail() { const baseURL = 'http://127.0.0.1:8000/' const [message, setMesssage] = useState([]) const id = useParams() const token = localStorage.getItem('authTokens'); const tokenObject = JSON.parse(token); const user_id = jwtDecode(tokenObject.access).user_id useEffect(() => { try { axios.get(baseURL + 'get-messages/' + user_id+ '/'+ id.id+ '/').then((res) => { setMesssage(res.data) }) } catch (error) { console.log(error) } }) return (
2:43 am
You
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, vis erat denique in, dicunt prodesset te vix.
2:44 am
Sharon Lessman
Sit meis deleniti eu, pri vidit meliore docendi ut, an eum erat animal commodo.
) } export default MessageDetail
